title: We're unable to log you in because you may be offline
body: Unable to log in, greyed out sign in button. I already successfully patched last night and played games last night. Are the servers down or something?

replies.body: This issue impacted a few players, but should be resolved now.  Are you still have any problems getting in?

Looks like this resolved itself after a couple hours.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
